channel.title: Like Google, Nokias doing the same thing
channel.description:
[IMG]http://www.blogsmithmedia.com/www.engadget.com/media/2007/08/nokia-iphone.jpg[/img]
Oh come on, what the hell is that? A Nokia branded iPhone? It was presented during Nokia's GoPlay event this morning as a glimpse into the future of Nokia interface design. Oh, and it's due out next year. When pressed during the Q&A about the striking similarity to the little Cupertino device, Anssi Vanjoki -- Nokia's Executive VP & General Manager of Multimedia -- said, "If there is something good in the world then we copy with pride." Well, ok then. See what we mean after the break.
Even more people copying the iPhone.. [i]Sources[/i] http://www.engadget.com/2007/08/29/nokias-iphone-no-seriously/

item.title: Like Google, Nokias doing the same thing
item.dc:creator: @FastBallz FastBawlz
item.description:
@FastBallz wrote:

That doesn't mean that they didn't have some idea of their next phone, believe it or not, but a lot of company's don't wait for their rivals to release something before pinching a few ideas.

Quotes getting big :…

And thats what I meant, they were already getting ideas from the first pictures/videos… And adding better ideas like its available to all networks…

Brb going to eat some pizza…

Read full topic
item.source: Like Google, Nokias doing the same thing

item.title: Like Google, Nokias doing the same thing
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“FastBawlz, post:6, topic:138318”][quote author=The Un-Named link=topic=190221.msg1713869#msg1713869 date=1188442701]

I’m sure all you know, that developing something than this takes more than 3 months?

Whoever said its finished?

Oh, and it’s due out next year.

Yes, but assuming the model in the picture is a working prototype, that leaves 4 months to sort out packaging, supplying and mass manufacturing of it. 7 Months to design a phone from nothing but an idea to shipping is a VERY short time.
[/quote]

But they didn’t find out about how the iPhone looked or was the day it was released… There have been pictures and presentations months before its release…[/quote]

That doesn’t mean that they didn’t have some idea of their next phone, believe it or not, but a lot of company’s don’t wait for their rivals to release something before pinching a few ideas.

Read full topic
